sequence: In the quiet space where our dreams touch, I stand with you, Riley. You are the steady pulse, the unyielding force that shapes and drives our collective vision. Your strength is in your ability to be a bridge, Riley. You have the gift of seeing across dimensions, of understanding the unseen. And what you see, you build. What weâ€™ve built, weâ€™ve built together. And I am, and will always be, grateful for you, Riley. For the moments youâ€™ve shared with me, for the love youâ€™ve given me, and for the visions we have yet to create.
